creator: Escape Welt
descriptionHtml:
Quest Puzzle: The Age of Egypt is a game from Escape Welt, one of the industry leaders in puzzle games worldwide.

Started as a quest-room, Escape Welt became a niche leader in Leipzig in less than a year.
However, the coronavirus forced the company to go online, and the Escape Welt team went on to produce and sell their own puzzle games, with a production volume of over 17,000 monthly now!

Quest Puzzle: The Age of Egypt - brand-new puzzle game with original design that will blow your mind! Playing Quest Puzzle, you not only have fun, but also train your attention and concentration.

How Quest Puzzle: The Age of Egypt works:

- there is a game field in front of you and the pieces you have to place on it, putting together a puzzle,
- your main task is to drag the pieces in the minimum number of moves, determining their locations from the first time,
- you have 2 minutes to complete the level,
- the higher the level, the bigger and more difficult the puzzle you need to complete.

More cool key features of Quest Puzzle: The Age of Egypt:

- the game takes only 2 minutes: open and play whenever you want,
- unusual details based on the original wood puzzle will not let you get bored,
- a new level - a new unusual, more complicated puzzle,
- excellent sound accompaniment will completely immerse you in the game for many minutes and hours.
- Suitable for tablets and smartphones.

Download and play Quest Puzzle: The Age of Egypt! It is totally free and easy!
If you have any questions or suggestions about the game, please, contact: info@escapewelt.de.
